channel.title: Me protesting
channel.description:
me protesting outside of ardounge bank saying with 3 other ppl save the s.o.b's
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img111.imageshack.us/img111/921/savethesonofabitchesxl3.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Me protesting
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

why would i take it off though i havnt cheated and i dont plan to , useing mopar isnt against the rules and even if i do my user name is still whothe0 if they find the need to ban me even if i hadnt done anything im 100% cool with that ill just appeal[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 10:52:17 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Silentone, post:8, topic:6332”]You get banned if you have anything todo with a community that does cheating,hacking runescape and shit, even blackmarkets so be careful[/quote]

dude i have neber and dont plan on cheating it all happened one day when i was pon putfile and i waz like searching videos and one was showing me how to get a priv server i was thinking hey! its not hacking or anything so, i tried it out and got hacked but that wasnt the end of the world, so i found mopar which didnt hack me and soon, i was playing runescape less often then mopar but i never i repeat NEVER! hacked rs maybe neopets once or twice but i felt soo guilty i gave out like 100k neopoints and maybe i used an auto talker once or twice for merchanting but nothing like auto miners or any shits like aryan oh and um black markets most of the time r just cool names for the part of forums wheere they sell stuff, even if it has a section for hacks anyways, long story short… im not afriad to put my username here cause i never haxk[br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 10:58:14 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:7, topic:6332”]nope miss silab was the real name of the account

We regret to inform you that this account has been banned for Encouraging Other Players to Break the Rules.

Please refer to article number 9 in the rules:

Rule 9: You must not encourage others to break any of the RuneScape rules.

Unfortunately, due to the severity of this complaint this ban is permanent.[/quote]

and lets face it miss silab wasnt the best account either but ur always risking ur account when becoming a global moderator on what could be one of the biggest (or the biggest) hacking comunity [br][size=1]Posted at: July 27, 2006, 11:00:03 AM[/size][hr][quote=“The Un-Named, post:3, topic:6332”]pixels, get a life.

He will not get banned if he hasn’t posted that he cheats. As far as I’m conserned it could be a friend edited a fake pick.[/quote]

how would it be fake?

Read full topic

item.title: Me protesting
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

nope miss silab was the real name of the account Tongue

We regret to inform you that this account has been banned for Encouraging Other Players to Break the Rules.


You encourage me to break rules. Not Runescape rules, but rules. Like the rule where you’re not supposed to meet chicks from the internets. But there are rules for a reason. If you encourage other players to break the Runescape rules, they might break the runescape rules. And if you meet chicks from the internets, they turn out to be fourty something year old balding jews who trap you in their basement and make you preform sex acts on them in return for a dirty pile of national geographics to sleep on and a crust of old pumpernickel bread.

Read full topic
